data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Shijiazhuang, Hebei, China humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Shijiazhuang, Hebei, China
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Shijiazhuang, Hebei, China.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Shijiazhuang access to a Bible in their own language.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Shijiazhuang, Hebei, China. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Luancheng
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Luancheng, Hebei, China.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Shijiazhuang, Hebei, China and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the county of Shijiazhuang.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.section_summary:
the county of Shijiazhuang, Hebei, China has a population of 4,205,700.

We estimate Shijiazhuang has 319,049 people who might know Jesus, 67,943 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,818,708 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Shijiazhuang, Hebei, China from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.
